TrUth 1;01- I believe some Christians are morally currupt and evil thinkers.
 TRutH 1;02- People as a whole are all the same and therefore shall be treated as equals by all who follow Nikki's bible of truth.
 trUtH1;03- Every one person has the right to feel what they want to feel, be it of hate or love. (Nikki's way prefers love.) 
 tRUtH 1;04- We love even those who spit thier hate at us, we still love and thierfor will be let into the great cookie that is heaven.
 TruTH 1;05- Be not fooled or repressed by religious communism. 
 trutH 1;06 The devil lives in all kinds of people, we are only human after all, Nikki understands this. 
 TrUtH 1;07 This bible is to be used for all of you to understand that if you have the right to go out and vow to be with the one you love, so does every other person in the world. 
 
 I am so sick of listning to christians and all the mean evil things they say. How is everyone else going to hell, and not them? What makes them so special? The bible does not say "Persicute anyone in the world who dissatisfies you due to their beliefs" Let GOD deal with all his wonderful children and stop pretending like you own heaven. Mean Christians (and thier are only a few who are horrible versions of humans), mean christians make me sad to believe in a God that would let his number 1 fans sprinkle all this darkness around the world.
 
 To anyone who is Gay that reads this posts, you know what rights you have and I don't have to tell you, but you are all Gods creatures and I learned in CCD that God loves everyone, everyone including you. Some of these Christians still believe what a book that was written thousands of years ago says. God see's us, he see's how people have changed and blossomed, he see's what is right with this world and what isn't. 50 years ago you litarally, got banished for getting pregnant before marridge and that was the biggest deal! and God was putting all the damned to hell, but no, times changed and someday the few christians who make things so sad around here, they will go to heaven and God will make them bow their heads in shame for being so cruel. 
 
 Nikki's bible is not true. I wrote it to get your attention.
People. Please post things in their correct sections.

People. Please post things in their correct sections.

 
 No surprise here.

Could we move this to the Whogivesaflyingmonkeycrap forum?

 
 Ditto my previous post!
 
 (You wouldn't be spewing any biblical dogma in here! Would ya, sunshine?)
